QuestData.Title: We Have Him Now
QuestData.Description: We have Gardul right cornered, commander.$B$BYe have a much better chance against him than me. Take him out, grab the formula from his corpse, and grab as many barrels o' poison as ye can carry.$B$BI'll stay here and make sure nae reinforcements come to Gardul's aid.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Venomshiv's Secret Formula and $2oa Poison Barrels.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't want to stick around here any longer than we need to.
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect work. I called in a ride for ye back to the outpost when yer ready.
